speaker: Doctor
text: Hi there! How have you been feeling with your asthma lately?

speaker: Patient
text: It's okay, but sometimes I still get out of breath when I play soccer.

speaker: Doctor
text: I see. How often are you using your albuterol inhaler?

speaker: Patient
text: Maybe a couple of times a week, mostly after playing.

speaker: Doctor
text: Alright. And have you noticed any side effects from the inhaler or the nasal spray?

speaker: Patient
text: No, I don't think so. They seem fine.

speaker: Doctor
text: That's good to hear. Since you're using the inhaler a few times a week, we might consider adding a daily controller medication to help manage your symptoms better. What do you think?

speaker: Patient
text: Okay, if it helps me breathe better when I play, that sounds good.
